body_html:
@pjh5

Thanks for your help, Paul. Your points do make sense, and I'm going to give a try.

I'm not familiar with the conda-system-mixing thing, but I heard a bit of it, and I believe that is the cause of my error. (Actually I thought conda env was completely independent of everything, including system, HAHA..)

Anyway, your answer does help me a lot. Thanks again.

body:
@pjh5 

Thanks for your help, Paul. Your points do make sense, and I'm going to give a try.

I'm not familiar with the conda-system-mixing thing, but I heard a bit of it, and I believe that is the cause of my error. (Actually I thought conda env was completely independent of everything, including system, HAHA..)

Anyway, your answer does help me a lot. Thanks again.
